name: Candy Puzzle (Watch & Phone)
description:
A great classic game for you to enjoy on your Apple Watch or your iPhone/iPad:

How to play:
- Match 3 or more candies to make them burst.
- Tap to shoot a candy.
- Drag your finger (or use Digital Crown) to aim , release to shoot.

2 game modes:
- Classic: after 3 faults (shooting without making candy explode) a new row will appear.
- Challenge: every 5s a new row will appear, you must play like crazy.

*** GET IT NOW ***
